org.panther.easybindings

Class BindingGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.panther.easybindings.BindingGroup

  • public class BindingGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    The BindingGroup class can be used to create and manage lots of bindings.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BindingGroup()
      Create a new empty binding group
